sentences.sContent: If you don't want to think about anything, just sit there silently and count your breaths - this will help you immensely as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you don't want to think about anything, just sit there silently and count your breaths - this will help you immensely as well.
sentences.sCn: 如果你不愿意去想任何事，就默默坐在那里，数一下您的呼吸----这也将极大地帮助到你。

synos.tran: 极大地；无限地；广大地；庞大地

words.tran: 巨大的，广大的；无边无际的；非常好的
